item.description: It's only a 1 mile loop or 1.5 mile loop thru an open park.So, I usually go around a few times. Lots of walkers, runners, and dogs. They also provide poop stations. I go all the time on the weekends, any weekend would be good. ps they're pretty strict about "no off leash" which is ok with me. Small parking lot in the front by the chapel. large parking lot not plowed so parking can be challenging if there is anything happening at the chapel. Anyone who wants to go let me know. Maria 508-641-5799
item.why: EXERCISE for the dogs and us. It's the only place I know of that clears the sidewalks all winter. With all the snow, it's been difficult to go on walks so I drive to Framingham.
item.name: Pack Walk Cushing Park
